title: Follow live: Win-or-go-home scenario for 1-seed Cavaliers
Celtics' Tatum has surgery on ruptured Achilles
description: Boston Celtics forward Jayson Tatum underwent surgery on Tuesday to repair a ruptured right Achilles tendon.
author: Tim Bontemps

title: Awoniyi in induced coma after surgery on abdominal injury
description: Nottingham Forest striker Taiwo Awoniyi is in an induced coma after undergoing the first phase of surgery on a serious abdominal injury.

title: Tale of two headers - drama at the Stadium of Light
description: A tale of two headers - a pair of big moments in either box decide Sunderland's Championship play-off semi-final against Coventry.

title: Lampard: One of the cruellest moments of my career
description: Coventry boss Frank Lampard believes his side's last-gasp Championship play-off semi-final defeat at Sunderland was one of the cruellest moments in his career.

title: Frimpong happy to move to Liverpool if Reds decide to sign Trent replacement
description: Jeremie Frimpong would be happy to move to Liverpool if they decide to sign a right-back this summer.

title: Ramírez homers, Allen pitches 6 sharp innings as Guardians blank Brewers for 2nd straight night, 2-0
description: José Ramírez hit his seventh homer, Logan Allen allowed three hits in six innings, and the Cleveland Guardians beat Milwaukee 2-0 on Tuesday night, their second consecutive shutout of the Brewers. Kyle Manzardo drove in the Guardians' other run with his second triple this season, a short flyball that got past a diving Jackson Chourio in center field to score Ramírez in the eighth inning.

title: OU's Sophia Bordi releases statement on absence from Sooners
description: OU freshman pitcher Sophia Bordi provided an update on her leave from the Sooners with a social-media post on Tuesday.
